channel.title: Loyalty Titles
channel.description: ok so i added everything correctly compiled 6 time :D in both client and server and when i go on server it dosnt work i quad checked every code and didnt work ive followed about 3 tuts please help im using insainityx i had to rip out the old system cause it didnt work

item.title: Loyalty Titles
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

well dude, you should use somethin like this:

//My players icons showing up when I speak if(myPrivilege == 4) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<img=4><col=23800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 3) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<img=3><col=13843226>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 2) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<img=2><col=0191255>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 1) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<img=1><col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); }

this is when you speak you see your title

Read full topic
